brief: Regulation 3: Look left and right when crossing a train line.
prompt: R&D would like to remind all pioneers to engage common sense in the presence of trains. Due to A recent spike in train related incidents and fatalities. R&D would like to further advise all pioneers, that they should always look left and right, when crossing an active train line.
message: R&D would like to remind all pioneers to engage common sense in the presence of trains. Due to A recent spike in train related incidents and fatalities. R&D would like to further advise all pioneers, that they should always look left and right, when crossing an active train line.
